1.
> select flightnum, max(arrdelay) maxd
> from airdelay
> group by flightnum order by maxd desc
> limit 10;
837	2137
377	1946
164	1724
922	1710
920	1688
945	1634
1717	1611
208	1597
587	1575
511	1528


2. 
> select month, sum(cancelled) as can 
> from airdelay 
> group by month order by can;
NULL	NULL
11	26715
10	31519
4	36492
5	42264
8	45359
3	46565
7	47945
12	48450
2	51482
6	54483
1	78250
9	128618

3.




4.
> select month, avg(distance) as avgD
> from airdelay
> group by month order by avgD desc;  
7	762.623479531478
8	762.0856298845124
12	758.7860198365465
6	757.4317025677191
9	753.9560752954651
11	753.0336456342745
10	751.0183440724186
5	749.4090899862516
4	746.7085801123238
3	745.3884451303944
2	741.3380609778181
1	739.6577407730061


5.
> select year, sum(cancelled) as can 
> from airdelay 
> group by year order by year;
NULL	NULL
1999	154311
2000	187490
2001	231198
2002	65143

> from airdelay

7. 
> select flightnum, sum(airtime) as atime
> from airdelay 
> group by flightnum order by atime desc 
> limit 10;

1	2965968
197	2612043
73	2348715
199	2347589
2	2320869
65	2311578
231	2267516
343	2259869
39	2258054
14	2235920

8.
> select dayofweek, sum(arrdelay) as d, sum(airtime) as a
> from airdelay
> group by dayofweek;
3	19844656	331194017
6	11139460	302585517
1	19934308	333321945
4	28452857	330932067
7	21141652	322777155
2	16067851	331590320
5	33255733	332985483

9.

> from airdelay
> group by dayofMonth order by dayofmonth;

10.
> select origin, dest, sum(arrdelay) as ad
> from airdelay
> group by origin, dest order by ad desc
> limit 10;
LAX	SFO	625225
LAX	LAS	581489
LAX	PHX	570729
LAS	PHX	553349
SFO	LAX	541449
ORD	LGA	526729
PHX	LAS	499447
PHX	LAX	494738
ORD	EWR	489820
ATL	ORD	485286


11.
> select origin, dest, avg(airtime) as avg
> from airdelay
> group by origin, dest order by avg desc
> limit 10;
EWR	HNL	589.9155617585485
DTW	HNL	541.1161825726141
ATL	HNL	524.6704545454545
HNL	EWR	524.1363952679193
STL	HNL	509.49556868537667
STL	OGG	504.9809619238477
ORD	HNL	502.572930955647
MSP	HNL	474.93901258470476
HNL	DTW	472.577868852459
HNL	ATL	472.1832917705736


12.
> select year, dayofweek, avg(airtime) as avg from airdelay
> group by year, dayofweek order by year, dayofweek;
1999	1	104.01658737597033
1999	2	104.09213613456278
1999	3	104.13495972744438
1999	4	104.14784465944916
1999	5	104.0237312814083
1999	6	107.55665913029709
1999	7	105.37514063382105
2000	1	105.89774717186536
2000	2	105.8168839386464
2000	3	105.81030912623885
2000	4	105.96511205208623
2000	5	105.83369325859566
2000	6	108.90351963754652
2000	7	107.25751842698104
2001	1	102.4804338751874
2001	2	102.60305110934593
2001	3	102.71648024944255
2001	4	103.02035335348596
2001	5	102.92705255880601
2001	6	105.48954426966533
2001	7	103.64424367572319
2002	1	105.08871706015708
2002	2	105.27130670337607
2002	3	105.0848559762082
2002	4	105.18535009071766
2002	5	105.09877048965079
